flavorText:
"You stop breathing for just a few minutes and everyone jumps to conclusions."
—Zarkuu, necrosavant

foreignData.name: Erstaunliche Erholung
foreignData.text: Bringe eine Kreaturenkarte Deiner Wahl aus Deinem Friedhof direkt ins Spiel und lege eine +1/+1-Marke auf diese Kreatur. Behandle diese Kreatur, als ob sie gerade gesprochen worden wäre.

name: Miraculous Recovery
originalText: Put target creature card from your graveyard into play and put a +1/+1 counter on that creature. Treat the creature as though it were just played.

rulings.text: The creature returns to the battlefield without a +1/+1 counter on it. Any abilities that trigger when a creature enters the battlefield will trigger or not as appropriate before it receives the +1/+1 counter and resolve after it has received that counter.
No player may take actions between the time the creature returns to the battlefield and the time you put a +1/+1 counter on it.

text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Put a +1/+1 counter on it.
